analyzed: pucchāmi tam bhagavā brūhi mā ita
pucchāmi tam bhagavā brūhi mā itanti

original: adiṭṭhajotanā pucchā, diṭṭhasaṁsandanā pucchā, vimaticchedanā pucchā …pe…
analyzed: a diṭṭha jotanā pucchā diṭṭha sasandanā pucchā vimati chedanā pucchā pe

original: Pucchāmi tanti pucchāmi taṁ yācāmi taṁ ajjhesāmi taṁ pasādemi taṁ, kathayassu meti—
analyzed: pucchāmi tanti pucchāmi tam yācāmi tam ajjhesāmi tam pasādemi ta kathayassu mā iti

original: Bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṁ …pe… sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṁ bhagavāti.
analyzed: bhagavā ati gārava adhivacanam etam pe sacchikā paññatti yat idam bhagavā ati

original: Brūhi metanti brūhi ācikkhāhi desehi paññapehi paṭṭhapehi vivarāhi vibhajāhi uttānīkarohi pakāsehīti—

i t ca ati pada sandhi pe
āyasmā iti piya vacanam garu vacanam āyasmā iti

original: Dhotakoti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmaṁ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṁ nāmakammaṁ nāmadheyyaṁ nirutti byañjanaṁ abhilāpoti—
analyzed: dhotako ti tassa brāhmaṇassa nāmam saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāraḥ nāmam nāmakammam nāmadheyyam nirutti byañjanam abhilāpo ti

original: Vācābhikaṅkhāmi mahesi tuyhanti tuyhaṁ vacanaṁ byappathaṁ desanaṁ anusāsanaṁ anusiṭṭhaṁ kaṅkhāmi abhikaṅkhāmi icchāmi sādiyāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi abhijappāmi.
analyzed: vācā abhikaṅkhāmi mahesi tuyhanti tuyham vacanam byappatham desanam anusāsanam anusiṭṭham kaṅkhāmi abhikaṅkhāmi icchāmi sādiyāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi abhijappāmi

original: Mahantaṁ sīlakkhandhaṁ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi …pe…
analyzed: mahantam sīlakkhandham esī gavesī pariyesī iti mahesi pe

original: Tava sutvāna nigghosanti tuyhaṁ vacanaṁ byappathaṁ desanaṁ anusāsanaṁ anusiṭṭhaṁ sutvā suṇitvā uggahetvā upadhārayitvā upalakkhayitvāti—
analyzed: tava sutvāna nigghosanti tuyham vacanam byappatham desanam anusāsanam anusiṭṭham sutvā suṇitvā uggahetvā upadhārayitvā upalakkhayitvā ati
adhi sīla sikkhā adhicitta sikkhā adhipaññā sikkhā pe

original: sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṁ samāya upasamāya vūpasamāya nibbāpanāya paṭinissaggāya paṭipassaddhiyā adhisīlampi sikkheyya, adhicittampi sikkheyya, adhipaññampi sikkheyya.
analyzed: sabba akusala abhisaṅkhārānam samāya upasamāya vūpasamāya nibbāpanāya paṭinissaggāya paṭipassaddhiyaḥ adhi sīlam pi sikkheyya adhi cittam pi sikkheyya adhi paññam pi sikkheyya
pucchāmi tam bhagavā brūhi mā ita

original: Tenahātappaṁ karohīti ātappaṁ karohi, ussāhaṁ karohi, ussoḷhiṁ karohi, thāmaṁ karohi,
analyzed: tenaha ātappam karohi iti ātappam karohi ussāham karohi ussoḷhim karohi thāmam karohi

original: dhitiṁ karohi, vīriyaṁ karohi, chandaṁ janehi sañjanehi upaṭṭhapehi samuṭṭhapehi
analyzed: dhitim karohi vīriyam karohi chandam janehi sañjanehi upaṭṭhapehi samuṭṭhapehi

original: Dhotakāti bhagavā taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ nāmena ālapati.
analyzed: dhotakāti bhagavā tam brāhmaṇam nāmena ālapati

original: Bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṁ …pe… sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṁ bhagavāti—
analyzed: bhagavā ati gārava adhivacanam etam pe sacchikā paññatti yat idam bhagavā ati

original: Idhāti imissā diṭṭhiyā imissā khantiyā imissā ruciyā imasmiṁ ādāye imasmiṁ dhamme
analyzed: idha ati imissā diṭṭhiyā imissā khantiyā imissā ruciyā imasmin ādāye imasmin dhamme

original: imasmiṁ vinaye imasmiṁ dhammavinaye imasmiṁ pāvacane imasmiṁ brahmacariye imasmiṁ
analyzed: imasmin vinaye imasmin dhamma vinaye imasmin pāvacane imasmin brahmacariye imasmin
satthu sāsane imasmin atta bhāve imasmin manussa loke

original: Nipakoti nipako paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.
analyzed: nipako ti nipako paṇḍito paññavā buddhimā ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī
kāye kāya anupassanā sati paṭṭhānam bhāvento sato pe

original: Ito sutvāna nigghosanti ito mayhaṁ vacanaṁ byappathaṁ desanaṁ anusāsanaṁ anusiṭṭhaṁ sutvā suṇitvā uggaṇhitvā upadhārayitvā upalakkhayitvāti—
analyzed: itas sutvāna nigghosanti itas mayham vacanam byappatham desanam anusāsanam anusiṭṭham sutvā suṇitvā uggaṇhitvā upadhārayitvā upalakkhayitvā ati
adhi sīla sikkhā adhicitta sikkhā adhipaññā sikkhā pe

original: Nibbānamattanoti attano rāgassa nibbāpanāya, dosassa nibbāpanāya, mohassa nibbāpanāya, kodhassa nibbāpanāya, upanāhassa nibbāpanāya …pe…
analyzed: nibbānam attanoti attanaḥ rāgassa nibbāpanāya dosassa nibbāpanāya mohassa nibbāpanāya kodhassa nibbāpanāya upanāhassa nibbāpanāya pe

original: sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārānaṁ samāya upasamāya vūpasamāya nibbāpanāya paṭinissaggāya paṭipassaddhiyā adhisīlampi sikkheyya, adhicittampi sikkheyya, adhipaññampi sikkheyya.
analyzed: sabba akusala abhisaṅkhārānam samāya upasamāya vūpasamāya nibbāpanāya paṭinissaggāya paṭipassaddhiyaḥ adhi sīlam pi sikkheyya adhi cittam pi sikkheyya adhi paññam pi sikkheyya

original: Imā tisso sikkhāyo āvajjanto sikkheyya, jānanto sikkheyya …pe…
analyzed: imāḥ tissaḥ sikkhāyaḥ āvajjantaḥ sikkheyya jānantaḥ sikkheyya pe

original: sacchikātabbaṁ sacchikaronto sikkheyya, ācareyya samācareyya samādāya vatteyyāti—
analyzed: sacchikātabbam sacchikaronto sikkheyya ācareyya samācareyya samādāya vatteyya ati
sammuti devāḥ upapatti devāḥ visuddhi devāḥ

original: Sammutidevā vuccanti rājāno ca rājakumārā ca deviyo ca.
analyzed: sammuti devāḥ vuccanti rājāno ca rāja kumārā ca deviyo ca

original: Upapattidevā vuccanti cātumahārājikā devā tāvatiṁsā devā yāmā devā tusitā devā nimmānaratī devā paranimmitavasavattī devā brahmakāyikā devā ye ca devā taduttari.
analyzed: upapattidevāḥ vuccanti cātumahārājikāḥ devā tāvatisāḥ devāḥ yāmāḥ devā tusitāḥ devāḥ nimmānaratī devā paranimmitavasavattī devāḥ brahmakāyikāḥ devāḥ ye ca devā tad uttari

original: Visuddhidevā vuccanti tathāgatasāvakā arahanto khīṇāsavā ye ca paccekabuddhā.
analyzed: visuddhi devāḥ vuccanti tathāgata sāvakāḥ arahantaḥ khīṇa āsavāḥ ye ca paccekabuddhā

original: Bhagavā sammutidevānañca upapattidevānañca visuddhidevānañca devo ca atidevo ca devātidevo ca sīhasīho nāganāgo gaṇigaṇī munimunī rājarājā.
analyzed: bhagavā sammuti devānañca upapatti devānañca visuddhi devānañca devo ca atidevaḥ ca devātidevaḥ ca sīha sīhaḥ nāga nāgaḥ gaṇi gaṇī muni muniḥ rāja rājā

original: Passāmahaṁ devamanussaloketi manussaloke devaṁ passāmi atidevaṁ passāmi devātidevaṁ passāmi dakkhāmi olokemi nijjhāyāmi upaparikkhāmīti—
analyzed: passāmaham deva manussa loke ti manussa loke devam passāmi atidevam passāmi devātidevam passāmi dakkhāmi olokemi nijjhāyāmi upaparikkhāmi iti

original: Akiñcananti rāgakiñcanaṁ dosakiñcanaṁ mohakiñcanaṁ mānakiñcanaṁ diṭṭhikiñcanaṁ kilesakiñcanaṁ
analyzed: akiñcananti rāga kiñcanam dosa kiñcanam moha kiñcanam māna kiñcanam diṭṭhi kiñcanam kilesa kiñcana

original: duccaritakiñcanaṁ, te kiñcanā buddhassa bhagavato pahīnā ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā
analyzed: te kiñcanā buddhassa bhagavataḥ pahīnā ucchinna mūlā tālāvatthukatā

original: anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā, tasmā buddho akiñcano.
analyzed: an abhāvaṅka tā āyatim an uppāda dhammā tasmā buddhaḥ akiñcanaḥ

original: Brāhmaṇoti bhagavā sattannaṁ dhammānaṁ bāhitattā brāhmaṇo—
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ iti bhagavā sattannam dhammānam bāhitattā brāhmaṇaḥ

original: sakkāyadiṭṭhi bāhitā hoti, vicikicchā bāhitā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso bāhito hoti,
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭhi bāhitā hoti vicikicchā bāhitā hoti sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ bāhitaḥ hoti

original: rāgo bāhito hoti, doso bāhito hoti, moho bāhito hoti, māno bāhito hoti, bāhitāssa
analyzed: rāgaḥ bāhitaḥ hoti dosaḥ bāhitaḥ hoti mohaḥ bāhitaḥ hoti mānaḥ bāhitaḥ hoti bāhitā assa

original: honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṅkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
analyzed: honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṅkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkha vipākā āyatim jāti jarā maraṇiyā
asitaḥ tādi pavuccate sa brahmā ati

original: Iriyamānanti carantaṁ viharantaṁ iriyantaṁ vattentaṁ pālentaṁ yapentaṁ yāpentanti—
analyzed: carantam viharantam iriyantam vattentam pālentam yapentam yāpentanti
tam tam namassāmi samanta cakkhu iti

original: Namassāmīti kāyena vā namassāmi, vācāya vā namassāmi, cittena vā namassāmi, anvatthapaṭipattiyā
analyzed: namassāmi iti kāyena vā namassāmi vācāya vā namassāmi cittena vā namassāmi anvattha paṭipattiyā

original: vā namassāmi, dhammānudhammapaṭipattiyā vā namassāmi sakkaromi garuṁ karomi mānemi pūjemi.
analyzed: vā namassāmi dhamma anudhamma paṭipattiyai vā namassāmi sakkaromi garum karomi mānemi pūjemi
samanta cakkhu iti samanta cakkhu vuccati sabbaññuta ñāṇa

original: Bhagavā sabbaññutañāṇena upeto samupeto upāgato samupāgato upapanno samupapanno samannāgato.
analyzed: bhagavā sabbaññuta ñāṇena upetaḥ samupetaḥ upāgataḥ samupāgataḥ upapannaḥ samupapannaḥ samannāgataḥ
sabbam abhiññāsi yat atthi na iyya
pamuñca mama sakka kathaṅkathā ahi iti

original: Sakkāti sakko bhagavā sakyakulā pabbajitotipi sakko.
analyzed: sakkā ati sakkaḥ bhagavā sakya kulā pabbajitaḥ iti pi sakko

original: Atha vā aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko.
analyzed: atha vai aḍḍhaḥ mahaddhanaḥ dhanavā atipi sakkaḥ

original: saddhādhanaṁ sīladhanaṁ hiridhanaṁ ottappadhanaṁ sutadhanaṁ cāgadhanaṁ paññādhanaṁ
analyzed: saddhā dhanam sīla dhanam hiri dhanam ottappa dhanam suta dhanam cāga dhanam paññā dhanam

original: satipaṭṭhānadhanaṁ sammappadhānadhanaṁ iddhipādadhanaṁ indriyadhanaṁ baladhanaṁ bojjhaṅgadhanaṁ
analyzed: sati paṭṭhāna dhanam sammappadhāna dhanam iddhipāda dhanam indriya dhanam bala dhanam bojjhaṅga dhana
magga dhanam phala dhanam nibbāna dhana

original: Imehi anekavidhehi dhanaratanehi aḍḍho mahaddhano dhanavātipi sakko.
analyzed: imehi anekavidhehi dhana ratanehi aḍḍhaḥ mahaddhanaḥ sakkaḥ

original: Atha vā sakko pahu visavī alamatto sūro vīro vikkanto abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīnabhayabheravo vigatalomahaṁsotipi sakko.
analyzed: atha vā sakkaḥ pahu visavī alamattaḥ sūraḥ vīraḥ vikkantaḥ abhīruḥ acchambhī anutrāsī apalāyī pahīna bhaya bheravaḥ vigata loma hasaḥ tipi sakkaḥ

original: Dukkhe kaṅkhā, dukkhasamudaye kaṅkhā, dukkhanirodhe kaṅkhā, dukkhanirodhagāminiyā
analyzed: dukkhe kaṅkhā dukkha samudaye kaṅkhā dukkha nirodhe kaṅkhā dukkha nirodha gāminiyā

original: paṭipadāya kaṅkhā, pubbante kaṅkhā, aparante kaṅkhā, pubbantāparante kaṅkhā, idappaccayatāpaṭiccasamuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhā.
analyzed: paṭipadāya kaṅkhā pubbante kaṅkhā aparante kaṅkhā pubbanta aparante kaṅkhā idappaccaya tā paṭicca samuppannesu dhammesu kaṅkhā

original: Yā evarūpā kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattaṁ vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakaṁ dvedhāpatho saṁsayo anekaṁsaggāho āsappanā parisappanā apariyogāhanā chambhitattaṁ cittassa manovilekho.
analyzed: yā evarūpā kaṅkhā kaṅkhāyanā kaṅkhāyitattam vimati vicikicchā dveḷhakam dvedhāpathaḥ sasayaḥ aneka saggāhaḥ āsappanā parisappanā a pariyogāhanā chambhitattam cittassa manovilekho

original: Pamuñca maṁ sakka kathaṅkathāhīti muñca maṁ pamuñca maṁ mocehi maṁ pamocehi maṁ uddhara maṁ samuddhara maṁ vuṭṭhāpehi maṁ kathaṅkathāsallatoti—
analyzed: pamuñca mam sakka kathaṅkathāhi iti muñca mam pamuñca mam mocehi mam pamocehi mam uddhara mam samuddhara mam vuṭṭhāpehi mam kathaṅkathā sallatoti
pamuñca mama sakka kathaṅkathā ahi iti

original: Nāhaṁ sahissāmi pamocanāyāti nāhaṁ taṁ sakkomi muñcituṁ pamuñcituṁ mocetuṁ pamocetuṁ uddharituṁ samuddharituṁ uṭṭhāpetuṁ samuṭṭhāpetuṁ kathaṅkathāsallatoti.
analyzed: na aham sahissāmi pamocanāya ati na aham tam sakkomi muñcitum pamuñcitum mocetum pamocetum uddharitum samuddharitum uṭṭhāpetum samuṭṭhāpetum
evam pi na aham sahissāmi pamocanāya

original: Atha vā na īhāmi na samīhāmi na ussahāmi na vāyamāmi na ussāhaṁ karomi na ussoḷhiṁ
analyzed: atha vā na īhāmi na samīhāmi na ussahāmi na vāyamāmi na ussāham karomi na ussoḍhi

original: karomi na thāmaṁ karomi na dhitiṁ karomi na vīriyaṁ karomi na chandaṁ janemi na sañjanemi
analyzed: karomi na thāmam karomi na dhitim karomi na vīriyam karomi na chandam janemi na sañjanemi

original: na nibbattemi na abhinibbattemi assaddhe puggale acchandike kusīte hīnavīriye appaṭipajjamāne dhammadesanāyāti.
analyzed: na nibbattemi na abhinibbattemi assaddhe puggale acchandike kusīte hīna vīriye appaṭipajjamāne dhamma desanāya ati
evam pi na aham sahissāmi pamocanāya

original: Te yadi moceyyuṁ sakena thāmena sakena balena sakena vīriyena sakena parakkamena
analyzed: te yadi moceyyum sakena thāmena sakena balena sakena vīriyena sakena parakkamena

original: sakena purisathāmena sakena purisabalena sakena purisavīriyena sakena purisaparakkamena
analyzed: sakena purisa thāmena sakena purisa balena sakena purisa vīriyena sakena purisa parakkamena

original: attanā sammāpaṭipadaṁ anulomapaṭipadaṁ apaccanīkapaṭipadaṁ anvatthapaṭipadaṁ dhammānudhammapaṭipadaṁ
analyzed: attanā sammā paṭipadam anuloma paṭipadam apaccanīka paṭipadam anvattha paṭipadam dhamma anudhamma paṭipadam
evam pi na aham sahissāmi pamocanāya

original: “so vata, cunda, attanā palipapalipanno paraṁ palipapalipannaṁ uddharissatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: saḥ vata cunda attanā palipa palipannaḥ param palipa palipannam uddharissati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: So vata, cunda, attanā adanto avinīto aparinibbuto paraṁ damessati vinessati parinibbāpessatīti netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjatī”ti.
analyzed: saḥ vata cunda attanā adantaḥ a vinītaḥ a parinibbutaḥ param damessati vinessati parinibbāpessati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati iti
evam pi na aham sahissāmi pamocanāya
evam pi na aham sahissāmi pamocanāya

original: “evameva kho, brāhmaṇa, tiṭṭhateva nibbānaṁ tiṭṭhati nibbānagāmī maggo tiṭṭhāmahaṁ
analyzed: evam eva kho brāhmaṇa tiṭṭhatā iva nibbānam tiṭṭhati nibbāna gāmī maggaḥ tiṭṭhāmaha

original: samādapetā, atha ca pana mama sāvakā mayā evaṁ ovadiyamānā evaṁ anusāsiyamānā appekacce
analyzed: samādapetāḥ atha ca pana mama sāvakāḥ mayā evam ovadiyamānāḥ evam anusāsiyamānāḥ appekacce
accantaniṭṭham nibbānam ārādhenti ekacce na ārādhenti iti
evam pi na aham sahissāmi pamocanāya

original: Kathaṅkathiṁ dhotaka kañci loketi kathaṅkathiṁ puggalaṁ sakaṅkhaṁ sakhilaṁ sadveḷhakaṁ savicikicchaṁ.
analyzed: kathaṅkathim dhotaka kañci loka iti kathaṅkathim puggalam sa kaṅkham sa khilam sa dveḷhakam sa vicikiccha

original: Kañcīti kañci khattiyaṁ vā brāhmaṇaṁ vā vessaṁ vā suddaṁ vā gahaṭṭhaṁ vā pabbajitaṁ vā devaṁ vā manussaṁ vā.
analyzed: kañci iti kañci khattiyam vā brāhmaṇam vā vessam vā suddam vā gahaṭṭham vā pabbajitam vā devam vā manussam vā
loka iti apāya loke pe āyatana loka iti

original: Dhammañca seṭṭhaṁ abhijānamānoti dhammaṁ seṭṭhaṁ vuccati amataṁ nibbānaṁ.
analyzed: dhammañca seṭṭham abhijānamānaḥ ti dhammam seṭṭham vuccati amatam nibbāna

original: Yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ sabba saṅkhāra samatho sabba upadhi paṭinissaggo taṇhā khayaḥ virāgaḥ nirodhaḥ nibbāna

original: Seṭṭhanti aggaṁ seṭṭhaṁ viseṭṭhaṁ pāmokkhaṁ uttamaṁ pavaraṁ dhammaṁ ājānamāno vijānamāno paṭivijānamāno paṭivijjhamānoti—
analyzed: seṭṭhanti aggam seṭṭham viseṭṭham pāmokkham uttamam pavaram dhammam ājānamānaḥ vijānamānaḥ paṭivijānamānaḥ paṭivijjhamānaḥ iti

original: Evaṁ tuvaṁ oghamimaṁ taresīti evaṁ kāmoghaṁ bhavoghaṁ diṭṭhoghaṁ avijjoghaṁ tareyyāsi uttareyyāsi patareyyāsi samatikkameyyāsi vītivatteyyāsīti—
analyzed: evam tuvam ogham imam taresi iti evam kāma ogham bhava ogham diṭṭha ogham avijja ogham tareyyāsi uttareyyāsi patareyyāsi samatikkameyyāsi vītivatteyyāsi iti
evam tuvam ogham imam taresi iti
yathā aham ākāsaḥ uva a byāpajjamānaḥ

original: Anusāsa brahme karuṇāyamānoti anusāsa brahme anuggaṇha brahme anukampa brahmeti—
analyzed: anusāsa brahme karuṇāyamānā iti anusāsa brahme anuggaṇha brahme anukampa brahma iti

original: Karuṇāyamānoti karuṇāyamāno anudayamāno anurakkhamāno anuggaṇhamāno anukampamānoti—
analyzed: karuṇāyamānaḥ iti karuṇāyamānaḥ anudayamānaḥ anurakkhamānaḥ anuggaṇhamānaḥ anukampamānaḥ iti

original: Vivekadhammaṁ yamahaṁ vijaññanti vivekadhammaṁ vuccati amataṁ nibbānaṁ.
analyzed: viveka dhammam yam aham vijaññanti viveka dhammam vuccati amatam nibbāna

original: Yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ sabba saṅkhāra samatho sabba upadhi paṭinissaggo taṇhā khayaḥ virāgaḥ nirodhaḥ nibbāna

original: Yamahaṁ vijaññanti yamahaṁ jāneyyaṁ ājāneyyaṁ vijāneyyaṁ paṭivijāneyyaṁ paṭivijjheyyaṁ adhigaccheyyaṁ phasseyyaṁ sacchikareyyanti—
analyzed: yam aham vijaññanti yam aham jāneyyam ājāneyyam vijāneyyam paṭivijāneyyam paṭivijjheyyam adhigaccheyyam phasseyyam sacchikareyyanti

original: Yathāhaṁ ākāsova abyāpajjamānoti yathā ākāso na pajjati na gaṇhati na bajjhati na palibajjhati, evaṁ apajjamāno agaṇhamāno abajjhamāno apalibajjhamānoti—
analyzed: yathā aham ākāsaḥ uva a byāpajjamānaḥ iti yathā ākāsaḥ na pajjati na gaṇhati na bajjhati na palibajjhati evam a pajjamānaḥ a gaṇhamānaḥ a bajjhamānaḥ a palibajjhamānaḥ iti
evam pi ākāsaḥ uva a byāpajjamānaḥ

original: Yathā ākāso na rajjati lākhāya vā haliddiyā vā nīliyā vā mañjeṭṭhāya vā evaṁ arajjamāno adussamāno amuyhamāno akilissamānoti—
analyzed: yathā ākāsaḥ na rajjati lākhāya vā haliddiyā vā nīliyā vā mañjeṭṭhāya vā evam a rajjamānaḥ a dussamānaḥ a muyhamānaḥ a kilissamānaḥ iti
evam pi ākāsaḥ uva a byāpajjamānaḥ

original: Yathā ākāso na kuppati na byāpajjati na patilīyati na paṭihaññati, evaṁ akuppamāno abyāpajjamāno appatilīyamāno appaṭihaññamāno appaṭihatamānoti—
analyzed: yathā ākāsaḥ na kuppati na byāpajjati na patilīyati na paṭihaññati evam a kuppamānaḥ a byāpajjamānaḥ ap patilīyamānaḥ ap paṭihaññamānaḥ ap paṭihatamānaḥ iti
evam pi ākāsaḥ uva a byāpajjamānaḥ

original: Idheva santoti idheva santo samāno idheva nisinno samāno imasmiṁyeva āsane nisinno samāno imissāyeva parisāya nisinno samānoti, evampi—
analyzed: idhā iva santaḥ iti idhā iva santaḥ samānaḥ idhā iva nisinnaḥ samānaḥ imasmiya eva āsane nisinnaḥ samānaḥ imissāya iva parisāya nisinnaḥ samānaḥ evam pi

original: Atha vā idheva santo upasanto vūpasanto nibbuto paṭippassaddhoti, evampi—
analyzed: atha vā idhā iva santaḥ upasantaḥ vūpasantaḥ nibbutaḥ paṭippassaddho ti evam pi
taṇhā nissayo ca diṭṭhi nissayo ca pe

original: ayaṁ diṭṭhinissayo … taṇhānissayaṁ pahāya diṭṭhinissayaṁ paṭinissajjitvā cakkhuṁ anissito, sotaṁ anissito, ghānaṁ anissito, jivhaṁ anissito, kāyaṁ anissito, manaṁ anissito, rūpe …
analyzed: ayam diṭṭhi nissayaḥ taṇhā nissayam pahāya diṭṭhi nissayam paṭinissajjitvā cakkhum a nissitaḥ sotam a nissitaḥ ghānam a nissitaḥ jivham a nissitaḥ kāyam a nissitaḥ manaṃ a nissitaḥ rūpe

original: sadde … gandhe … rase … phoṭṭhabbe … dhamme … kulaṁ … gaṇaṁ … āvāsaṁ … lābhaṁ … yasaṁ
analyzed: sadde gandhe rase phoṭṭhabbe dhamme kulam gaṇam āvāsam lābham yasa

original: … pasaṁsaṁ … sukhaṁ … cīvaraṁ … piṇḍapātaṁ … senāsanaṁ … gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṁ
analyzed: pasasam sukham cīvaram piṇḍapātam senāsanam gilāna paccaya bhesajja parikkhāra

original: … kāmadhātuṁ … rūpadhātuṁ … arūpadhātuṁ … kāmabhavaṁ … rūpabhavaṁ … arūpabhavaṁ …
analyzed: kāmadhātum rūpadhātum a rūpadhātum kāma bhavam rūpa bhavam a rūpa bhavam
saññā bhavam asaññā bhavam nevasaññānāsaññābhavam ekavokāra bhavam catuvokāra bhavam
pañcavokāra bhavam atītam anāgatam paccuppannam diṭṭha suta muta viññātabbe

original: dhamme asito anissito anallīno anupagato anajjhosito anadhimutto nikkhanto nissaṭo
analyzed: dhamme asitaḥ a nissitaḥ an allīnaḥ an upagataḥ an ajjhositaḥ an adhimuttaḥ nikkhantaḥ nissaṭaḥ

original: Careyyanti careyyaṁ vihareyyaṁ iriyeyyaṁ vatteyyaṁ pāleyyaṁ yapeyyaṁ yāpeyyanti—
analyzed: careyyanti careyyam vihareyyam iriyeyyam vatteyyam pāleyyam yapeyyam yāpeyyanti
yathā aham ākāsaḥ uva a byāpajjamānaḥ

original: Kittayissāmi te santinti rāgassa santiṁ, dosassa santiṁ, mohassa santiṁ, kodhassa santiṁ, upanāhassa …pe…
analyzed: kittayissāmi te rāgassa santi dosassa santi mohassa santi kodhassa santi upanāhassa pe

original: makkhassa … paḷāsassa … issāya … macchariyassa … māyāya … sāṭheyyassa … thambhassa
analyzed: makkhassa paḷāsassa issāya macchariyassa māyāya sāṭheyyassa thambhassa

original: … sārambhassa … mānassa … atimānassa … madassa … pamādassa … sabbakilesānaṁ … sabbaduccaritānaṁ
analyzed: sa ārambhassa mānassa atimānassa madassa pamādassa sabba kilesānam sabba duccaritānaṃ
sabba darathānam sabba pariḷāhānam sabba santāpānam sabba akusala abhisaṅkhārānam

original: santiṁ upasantiṁ vūpasantiṁ nibbutiṁ paṭippassaddhiṁ kittayissāmi pakittayissāmi
analyzed: santim upasantim vūpasantim nibbutim paṭippassaddhim kittayissāmi pakittayissāmi

original: ācikkhissāmi desessāmi paññapessāmi paṭṭhapessāmi vivarissāmi vibhajissāmi uttānīkarissāmi pakāsissāmīti—
analyzed: ācikkhissāmi desessāmi paññapessāmi paṭṭhapessāmi vivarissāmi vibhajissāmi uttānīkarissāmi pakāsissāmi iti

original: Dhotakāti bhagavā taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ nāmena ālapati.
analyzed: dhotakāti bhagavā tam brāhmaṇam nāmena ālapati

original: Bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṁ …pe… sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṁ bhagavāti—
analyzed: bhagavā ati gārava adhivacanam etam pe sacchikā paññatti yat idam bhagavā ati

original: Diṭṭhe dhammeti diṭṭhe dhamme ñāte dhamme tulite dhamme tīrite dhamme vibhūte dhamme vibhāvite dhamme sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti …pe…
analyzed: diṭṭhe dhamme iti diṭṭhe dhamme ñāte dhamme tulite dhamme tīrite dhamme vibhūte dhamme vibhāvite dhamme sabbe saṅkhārāḥ aniccā ati pe

original: yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhammanti diṭṭhe dhamme ñāte dhamme tulite dhamme tīrite dhamme vibhāvite dhamme vibhūte dhammeti, evampi—
analyzed: yam kiñci samudaya dhammam sabbam tam nirodha dhamman ti diṭṭhe dhamme ñāte dhamme tulite dhamme tīrite dhamme vibhāvite dhamme vibhūte dhamme iti evam pi

original: Atha vā dukkhe diṭṭhe dukkhaṁ kathayissāmi, samudaye diṭṭhe samudayaṁ kathayissāmi, magge diṭṭhe maggaṁ kathayissāmi, nirodhe diṭṭhe nirodhaṁ kathayissāmīti, evampi—
analyzed: atha vā dukkhe diṭṭhe dukkham kathayissāmi samudaye diṭṭhe samudayam kathayissāmi magge diṭṭhe maggam kathayissāmi nirodhe diṭṭhe nirodham kathayissāmi iti evam pi

original: Atha vā sandiṭṭhikaṁ akālikaṁ ehipassikaṁ opaneyyikaṁ paccattaṁ veditabbaṁ viññūhīti, evampi—
analyzed: atha vā sandiṭṭhikam akālikam ehipassikam opaneyyikam paccattam veditabbam viññūhi iti evam pi

original: Anītihanti na itihītihaṁ na itikirāya na paramparāya na piṭakasampadāya na takkahetu
analyzed: anīti hanti naḥ iti hīti han naḥ itikirāya na paramparāya na piṭaka sampadāya na takka hetu

original: na nayahetu na ākāraparivitakkena na diṭṭhinijjhānakkhantiyā sāmaṁ sayamabhiññātaṁ
analyzed: na naya hetu na ākāra parivitakkena na diṭṭhi nijjhāna khantiyā sāmam sayam abhiññāta
atta paccakkha dhamma tam kathayissāmi iti

original: Yaṁ viditvā sato caranti yaṁ viditaṁ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṁ katvā;
analyzed: yam viditvā caranti yam viditam katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtam katvā

original: “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti viditaṁ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṁ katvā;
analyzed: sabbe saṅkhārāḥ aniccā ati viditam katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtam katvā

original: “yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamman”ti viditaṁ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṁ katvā.
analyzed: yam kiñci samudaya dhammam sabbam tam nirodha dhamman ti viditam katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtam katvā
kāye kāya anupassanā sati paṭṭhānam bhāvento sato pe

original: Caranti caranto viharanto iriyanto vattento pālento yapento yāpentoti—
analyzed: caranti carantaḥ viharantaḥ iriyantaḥ vattentaḥ pālentaḥ yapentaḥ yāpentoti

original: Tare loke visattikanti visattikā vuccati taṇhā.
analyzed: tare loke visattikam ti visattikā vuccati taṇhā

original: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ rāgaḥ sa arāgaḥ pe abhijjhā lobho akusala mūla

original: Visattikāti kenaṭṭhena visattikā …pe… visaṭā vitthatāti visattikā.
analyzed: visattikā ati kenaṭṭhena visattikā pe visaṭā vitthatā ati visattikā
loka iti apāya loke pe āyatana loke

original: Tare loke visattikanti loke vesā visattikā, loke vetaṁ visattikaṁ sato tareyya uttareyya patareyya samatikkameyya vītivatteyyāti—
analyzed: tare loke visattikanti loke vā isā visattikā loke vā itam visattikam satas tareyya uttareyya patareyya samatikkameyya vītivatteyya ati

original: Tanti tuyhaṁ vacanaṁ byappathaṁ desanaṁ anusāsanaṁ anusiṭṭhaṁ nandāmi abhinandāmi modāmi anumodāmi icchāmi sādiyāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi abhijappāmīti—
analyzed: tanti tuyham vacanam byappatham desanam anusāsanam anusiṭṭham nandāmi abhinandāmi modāmi anumodāmi icchāmi sādiyāmi patthayāmi pihayāmi abhijappāmi iti

original: Mahantaṁ sīlakkhandhaṁ esī gavesī pariyesīti mahesi, mahantaṁ samādhikkhandhaṁ …pe…
analyzed: mahantam sīla kkhandham esī gavesī pariyesī iti mahesi mahantam samādhi kkhandham pe

original: Yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhakkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbānaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ saḥ sabba saṅkhāra samatho sabba upadhi paṭinissaggo taṇhā khayaḥ virāgaḥ nirodhaḥ nibbāna

original: Uttamanti aggaṁ seṭṭhaṁ viseṭṭhaṁ pāmokkhaṁ uttamaṁ pavaranti—
analyzed: uttamanti aggam seṭṭham viseṭṭham pāmokkham uttamam pavaranti

original: Yaṁ viditvā sato caranti yaṁ viditaṁ katvā …pe…
analyzed: yam viditvā caranti yam viditam katvā

original: “sabbe saṅkhārā aniccā”ti viditaṁ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṁ katvā;
analyzed: sabbe saṅkhārāḥ aniccā ati viditam katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtam katvā
sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhā ati sabbe dhammā anattā ati pe

original: “yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhamman”ti viditaṁ katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṁ katvā.
analyzed: yam kiñci samudaya dhammam sabbam tam nirodha dhamman ti viditam katvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtam katvā
kāye kāya anupassanā sati paṭṭhānam bhāvento sato pe

original: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ rāgaḥ sa arāgaḥ pe abhijjhā lobho akusala mūla

original: Visattikāti kenaṭṭhena visattikā …pe… visaṭā vitthatāti visattikā.
analyzed: visattikā ati kenaṭṭhena visattikā pe visaṭā vitthatā ati visattikā
loka iti apāya loke pe āyatana loke

original: Tare loke visattikanti loke vesā visattikā, loke vetaṁ visattikaṁ sato tareyyaṁ uttareyyaṁ …pe…
analyzed: tare loke visattikanti loke vā isā visattikā loke vā itam visattikam satas tareyyam uttareyyam pe

original: Yaṁ kiñci sampajānāsīti yaṁ kiñci sampajānāsi ājānāsi paṭivijānāsi paṭivijjhasīti—
analyzed: yam kiñci sampajānāsi iti yam kiñci sampajānāsi ājānāsi paṭivijānāsi paṭivijjhasi iti

original: Dhotakāti bhagavā taṁ brāhmaṇaṁ nāmena ālapati.
analyzed: dhotakāti bhagavā tam brāhmaṇam nāmena ālapati

original: Bhagavāti gāravādhivacanametaṁ …pe… sacchikā paññatti, yadidaṁ bhagavāti—
analyzed: bhagavā ati gārava adhivacanam etam pe sacchikā paññatti yat idam bhagavā ati
uddham adhas tiriyañca api majjhā iti
tiriyam ca api majjhe ti paccuppanna
tiriyam ca api majjhe ti manussa lokaḥ
tiriyam ca api majjhe ti abyākatāḥ dhammā
tiriyan ca api majjhā iti rūpadhātu
tiriyam ca api majjhā iti adukkham asukhā vedanā
tiriyañca api majjhā iti vemajjhā iti

original: Etaṁ viditvā saṅgoti loketi saṅgo eso lagganaṁ etaṁ bandhanaṁ etaṁ palibodho esoti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṁ katvāti—
analyzed: etam viditvā loka iti saṅgaḥ esaḥ lagganam etam bandhanam etam palibodhaḥ esaḥ iti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtam katvā ati
taṇhā ati rūpa taṇhā sadda taṇhā pe

original: Bhavābhavāyāti bhavābhavāya kammabhavāya punabbhavāya kāmabhavāya, kammabhavāya kāmabhavāya
analyzed: bhava abhavāya ati bhava abhavāya kamma bhavāya punabbhavāya kāma bhavāya kamma bhavāya kāma bhavāya

original: punabbhavāya rūpabhavāya, kammabhavāya rūpabhavāya punabbhavāya arūpabhavāya, kammabhavāya
analyzed: punabbhavāya rūpa bhavāya kamma bhavāya rūpa bhavāya punabbhavāya arūpa bhavāya kamma bhavāya
arūpa bhavāya punabbhavāya punappunabbhavāya punappunagatiyai punappunaupapattiyai

original: punappunapaṭisandhiyā punappunaattabhāvābhinibbattiyā taṇhaṁ mākāsi mā janesi mā
analyzed: punappuna paṭisandhiyā punappuna atta bhāva abhinibbattiyā taṇham mā akāsi mā janesi mā

original: sañjanesi mā nibbattesi mābhinibbattesi, pajaha vinodehi byantīkarohi anabhāvaṁ gamehīti—
analyzed: sañjanesi mā nibbattesi mā abhinibbattesi pajaha vinodehi byantīkarohi anabhāvam gamehi iti
satthā me bhante bhagavā sāvakaḥ ham asmi iti
